item.title: LeetCode 1. Two Sum
item.description: LeetCode 1. Two Sum Easy Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. Example: Given nums = [2, 7, 11, 15], target = 9, Because nums[0] + nums[1] = 2 + 7 = 9, return [0, 1]. 解決方法 1 直覺的話就是暴力解法，用所有元素組合兩兩相加直到找出加總等於 target 為止。
